UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational design of hyperstable antibacterial peptides for food preservation.
Literature.Author: Vishweshwaraiah YL, Acharya A, Hegde VV, Prakash B

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human retinal epithelial cells ARPE-19:15% Killing=160 µg/ml,Human retinal epithelial cells ARPE-19:25% Killing=200 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 13932(MIC=>150µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12900(MIC=>150µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=150µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum MCC 2112(MIC=150µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 9844(MIC=>150µg/ml)
